catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 529
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: five-character poem; bold, angular characters; smaller inscriptions at L and R edges
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

center: [Eternal blessing on the sagacious ruler] (Ei shuku seimei kun / Nagaku seimei no kii o shukusu)
markings: Seals URC and LL: [Rinzai Seishu]; [Bukkoku Shujin]; [Seidon]
object_name: Hanging scroll, one of a triptych
title: Single-Line Calligraphy [center of a triptych of single-line calligraphies]
